summary:
Customize your Home and Lock screen with a smooth blend of iOS and Material You today by using this preset.

â€¢ Download wallpapers from here

â€¢ Create a folder named '2' and inside of it
scoreText:
create two folders named 'fg' and 'bg'
â€¢ Add background images in 'bg' folder by naming 1.png...2.png and so on
â€¢ Add foreground images in 'fg' folder with corresponding names as in 'bg' folder
â€¢ Now select no. of wallpapers in this folder and folder no. inside global variable 'images' and enjoy

This is not a stand-alone app

it requires the KLWP Pro version to be able to import.

â€¢ Download the App
â€¢ Open it
column13:
tap on the preset

Current Features

â€¢ 30 Depth wallpapers
â€¢ New UI to customize everything
â€¢ Variable rounded corners
â€¢ Dark and light modes based on the system
â€¢ Multiple widgets for home and lock screen
â€¢ Material You themed icons and clock colors extracted from the current background
â€¢ Blurred background for all the widgets
â€¢ Expand and collapse widgets
â€¢ Change wallpapers by tapping on the button or let it change on a daily basis
â€¢ Change roundness globally
â€¢ Hide/Unhide widgets
â€¢ Change Dock height
â€¢ Change bottom margin
â€¢ Hide/Unhide dock
â€¢ Change saturation and value of accent colours
â€¢ Change positions of locks screen widgets and lock button
â€¢ Hide unhide lock screen elements separately

How to customize

â€¢ Use the whole new editor or use global variables from the app
â€¢ Change wallpaper by tapping on the image icon; wallpaper changes automatically every day as well.
â€¢ Change the radius of all the components by changing a single value in Global variables (GV) > "wid R"
â€¢ Change font GV>font
â€¢ Change the value (Value) and saturation (Sat) of both the accent colours from GV>Colors>Accent1 and Accent2
â€¢ Change the homescreen widget's vertical position by changing the value of "home.pos" global variable
â€¢ Change the lockscreen widget's vertical position by changing the value of "LS.wid.p" global variable
â€¢ Change the lock icon's vertical position by changing the value of "Lock.pos" global variable
â€¢ Toggle the visibility of the clock

title: iOS Projekt for kwgt
summary:
KWGT: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.widget&hl=es_419&gl=US
KWGT Pro Key: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.widget.pro&hl=es_419&gl=US

iProjeKt is a redesign of iOS widgets. With functionality and interactivity in mind.

HOW TO USE THEM?
When you set the widget in KWGT you need to acces the widget editor and go to the "Globals" tab there you'ill have all the options for each widget.

FEATURES:
-Automatic (Set by the system) and Manual Dark mode on most widgets
-Advanced music widgets that include vlume control. Song and artist info and even a Lyrics option that works with most songs (needs improvements)
-News portal with different topics
-Weather widgets with good design and a lot of information
-Complications All-In-One widget based on Jilbreak Tweak
-Advanced system info options in some widgets
-Battery info widgets
-And more!

SPECIAL FEATURES:

How to use Notes widget:
-Download "txtpad" app from Google Play. Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vladyslavpohrebniakov.txtpad&hl=es_419&gl=US
-Create a .txt file called "notes.txt" and save your notes there (it can be any type of text)
-Enjoy!

Blurring Background in some widgets :
As KWGT Widgets are not capable of real-time blurring or getting the position in relation with the wallpaper you need to go to the Globals section in KWGT editor and set your current wallpaper image
scoreText:
scale it to the position where you want to put the widget and save changes. I know it's kinda anoying but its the only solution right now. if you don't like it just enable the "Solid Backgroun option and it will take the wallpaper's color and make nice gradient with it.

RECOMENDATIONS:
-Give KWGT all permitions needed
-Set the preffered music player in KWGT settings
-Widgets refreshes every 5 seconds by default (you can change it to refresh by second but it will consume more battery)

title: iOS Widgets for KWGT
summary:
*This is not a stand alone app. IOS widgets require KWGT PRO ( not free version of that app).*

IOS like widgets are now available on android in this newest KWGT pack. A mixture of 65 IOS widgets and some different ones are available right now with more widgets to come in the near future.

Read limitations and fixes below!!

Included are 65 widgets with light and dark versions respectively. More coming with each new update!

Currently are included:

Twitter widgets
Google widgets
Weather widgets
Control center widgets
Calendar widgets
Battery widgets
Time widgets
Fitness widgets
News widgets
Gallery slideshow widget
Notes widget
Analog Clock widgets
World Clock widget
Nike NRC widget
Big calendar widget
App folders widgets
Dock widgets
More to come!

Please use anything x4 wide grid in your launcher (eg. 9x4). All the widgets are made like this and will look the best in this configuration.

Also
scoreText: use Google Fit
score: Google Calendar in order to get the best readings for the fitness widget and the calendar widgets. If you use different apps
column13:
those widgets might not even work!

You can enable/disable widget names for each widget in the "Globals" tab
column14:
first thing from the top. It's a simple ON/OFF switch.

To change the feed of which you want Twitter or Instagram to be displayed do the following:
1. Copy the profile's URL (go to his/hers profile and copy the link)
2. Go to https://rss.app/myfeeds and generate a feed with the link copied previously
3. Copy the generated link.
4. In the globals tab for the Twitter and Instagram widgets there is a value called "url". Paste your generated link there. That's it.


In order for theanalog clock widget to display seconds correctly you need to set KWGT widget update to fast or one second in KWGT settings.

The Nike running widget takes data from google fit so use that! You need to set the goal that you want manually. Just tap the widget
column15: go to globals and set your goal
column16:
that's it. Everything else works accordingly.

Control center has limitations due to KWGT! Only Wifi and Bluetooth will toggle right from the widget. Mobile data and airplane mode will take you to settings. Please understand this is a limitation with how KWGT works.

Fitness widget needs google fit in order to display fitness data. Other apps might work
column17:
but it's been tested and working with google fit.

For the gallery widget you can change the folder or path where you want your photos to be displayed. Also you can change the frequency
column18:
default is 1 minute. Global value for path is available so you need to change that if you want another folder.

Cycle between news by taping on the right and left side of the image and open the link to the article by taping on the title.

News widget already set up for CNN news
column19: you can change the global value "rssone" for a different rss feed
column20:
but I recommend not because some feeds have no images so the widget would not display a thumnail.

Notes widget has limitations due to KWGT. You can add your own notes by changing the global values "Note 1
column21: Note 2
column22:
Note 3". Tap on the orange part of the widget and that will open KWGT editor where you can change those values.
If you tap on the white part it will open Google Keep.

For the Dock widget you need to use Nova Launcher or any launcher that supports overlaping of items. For nova go to homescreen settings and enable widget overlaping. Then just place your icons on top of the dock widget.

Email me for any issues or if you want to change something about a widget.

title: AirPlayMirror
summary: AirPlayMirror is Receiver App on Android for AirPlay Mirroring and Casting from Apple devices. An Apple device can be an iPhone
scoreText: an iPad
score: an iPodTouch
column13: a MacBook
column14: a iMac
column15: or a MacMini. Using AirPlayMirror Receiver
column16: the Android device can mirror screen of an Apple device or can playback audio/video/photos stored on Apple device or can play YouTube video link from Apple device over the local network. This is highly useful for sharing the screen and content of Apple device with family
column17: friends
column18: colleagues
column19:
customers or business partners.

Features:
-------------
o Mirroring of Screen of Apple Devices (iOS version 9 to 15).
o Mirror/cast from up to 4 Apple devices simultaneously.
o Playback of Apple deviceâ€™s media content.
o Slideshow of photos
column20:
images and videos of Apple device.
o Restrict unauthorized user from sharing his Apple device using passcode feature.
o Playback of YouTube free content from Apple device to AirPlayMirror receiver.
o Resize and move the mirroring/casting window in the App view.
o Share game screen while playing game on Apple device.
o Share game screen while playing game on Apple device.
o Bluetooth Low Energy based Airplay advertising to mirror devices across different subnets.

Instructions of using AirPlayMirror App:

1. Launch AirPlayMirror App on Android Device. The App will start advertising Android Device as an AirPlay Receiver. The default name of the Receiver is Android Deviceâ€™s name.

2. On Apple Device
column21:
enable AirPlay and select AirPlayMirror Receiver's name from the list. Enable Mirroring using the slider. The Apple device should be in the same network as the Android Device.

3. On AirPlayMirror App
column22: the list of Apple devices connected to the App are shown in semi transparent control-screen which slides out on touching ">". For unhindered mirroring
column23:
slide control -screen to left by swiping it to left or by touching outside the control-screen.

4. One can disconnect Apple device and mute/unmute the mirroring/casting by touching mirroring window in the App for about two seconds
column24:
or by going to control screen and perform disconnect and mute/unmute.

5. Touching Settings icon on the control-screen
column25: the user can navigate to Settings
column26: where user can rename AirPlayMirror Receiver's name
column28: toggle AirPlayMirror Receiver discovery to on/off
column29: change quality of mirroring
column31:
or reset to default settings.

Known Limitation:
1. The app does not work with DRM protected content like Netflix
column33:
paid Google Movies etc.
2. App has limited capability for Live TV from only some Apps or websites.

You may reach us at sales@neoyantra.com.

column53:

-Most connection problems can be resolved by restarting the casting receivers or phone.
-Flash movie websites are not supported by stream device manufacturers.

Metronome Beats has controls for easily increasing and decreasing the tempo in small increments by one touch of the screen. The visual beat indicators help you to keep track of where you are in the bar and enable you to mute the metronome whilst still monitoring the tempo visually. You can also create your own custom sound settings or simply change the pitch to make Metronome Beats easier to hear over your instrument.

If the compass shows wrong

title: Apple watch series 8 App Guide
summary: Apple watch series 8 App Guide - Announced in September 2022
scoreText: the Apple Watch Series 8 is the newest iteration of the Apple Watch that originally came out in 2015
score:
and it replaces the prior-generation Apple Watch Series 7.

The Apple Watch Series 8 features no design updates compared to the prior-generation model
column13: with all of the same features and functionality. There continue to be 41mm and 45mm size options
column14: and the casings feature the same rounded edges
column15: slim-bordered display
column16: sapphire crystal backing
column17:
and Digital Crown with haptic feedback.

There is an Always-On display that lets users see their watch face and complications at all times
column18: and the Series 8 features crack-resistant front glass
column19: IP6X dust resistance
column20: and a WR50 water resistance rating. Apple Pay purchases are available with credit and debit cards stored in the Wallet app
column21: and it has the same faster charging speeds with updated charging puck as on the Series 7. There is an S8 chip inside
column22:
but it is essentially identical to the S6 chip from two years ago with no speed improvements.

Heart rate monitoring
column23: blood oxygen detection
column24: ECG readings
column25: sleep tracking
column26: fall detection
column27: and loud noise monitoring continue to be available
column28:
plus Apple has added a few new features this year. There's a built-in temperature sensor that's used for giving women additional insights into their health.

The feature is based on a two-sensor design that captures temperature information from the back of the watch near the skin and under the display
column29: reducing environmental bias. At night
column30: the Apple Watch Series 8 takes a temperature reading every five seconds
column31: and it can detect changes as small as one degree. Apple Watch Series 8 owners can see nightly shifts in their baseline temperature that can be the result of exercise
column33:
or illness.

Apple Watch Series 8 uses the temperature sensor to provide women with retrospective ovulation estimates
column34: which can be helpful for family planning purposes. The data also provides improved period predictions
column35: and in watchOS 9
column36: women can receive notifications if a logged cycle history shows a possible deviation like irregular
column37: infrequent
column38:
or prolonged periods.

A new Crash Detection feature takes advantage of an updated gyroscope and accelerometer along with an advanced sensor-fusion algorithm to detect severe car crashes and alert emergency services. When a crash occurs
column39: the Apple Watch checks in with the user and if no response is received within a 10-second countdown
column40:
emergency responders will be contacted.

Battery life remains the same at up to 18 hours
column41: but it can be extended with a new Low Power Mode added in watchOS 9. With Low Power Mode
column42: the Apple Watch can run for up to 36 hours
column43: but it disables the Always-On display
column44: turns off background heart rate measurements
column46:
and more.

There are both GPS and cellular Apple Watch models
column48: Apple plans to add support for international roaming
column49:
allowing Apple Watch owners to connect to a cellular plan when traveling abroad.

displays demo data. Real data will only be displayed on the Main Time watch face on the smartwatch.

title: CalDAV-Sync
summary:
CalDAV-Sync is a CalDAV client for Android to synchronize events and tasks. Due to its implementation as sync adapter it integrates seamlessly with the native calendar app and widgets. Also check out CardDAV-Sync

To get task support
scoreText:
please install this task app https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.dmfs.tasks

Since version 0.4 CalDAV-Sync supports read-only sync of webcal ics feeds (via http & https).

Important note for Android 4.1 and Samsung users: To prevent the removal of your accounts on reboot install this app:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.dmfs.jb.workaround.caldavsync
Although this issue seems to be fixed in Android 4.2 the workaround is still required on Samsung devices.

Please note that there is a new issue in Android 4.4: http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=66905
It causes accounts to be removed when an app is updated. Installing the workaround app should help.

This app will create new calendars on your device (one for each calendar on your server account).

Get support and news via Twitter https://twitter.com/dmfs_org

Please send me an email if you find a bug. Without detailed error description I often can't do anything especially when I can't reproduce it. It's also possible that your server has a bug that CalDAV-Sync can not (yet) tolerate or work around. If you report bugs I can fix them quickly and everyone will benefit.

- david.fx

Permissions

ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
Optional permission that can be granted if Foldersync should detect SSID name on Android 9 or newer.
ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
Needed to determine current network state
ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
Needed to access info about the current WiFi state (SSID etc.)
CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE/CHANGE_WIFI_STATE
These two are needed to be allowed to turn WiFi on and off
CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE
Needed to autodiscover WebDAV

INTERNET

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Needed to read and write files from and to SD card
RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED
Needed to automatically start after reboot of device
column17:
so scheduled syncs will still run

WAKE_LOCK
Needed to keep the device running during a sync

title: AirGuard - AirTag protection
summary:
With AirGuard you get the anti-tracking protection you deserve!
The app periodically scans your surroundings for potential tracking devices
scoreText:
like AirTags or other Find My devices.

The AirTags and other Find My devices are simple
score:
small and perfect to track Android users!
Without tracking warnings
column13: as integrated on iOS
column14: anyone could try to track your behavior by placing an AirTag in your jacket
column15:
backpack or car.

With the app you can play a sound on AirTags and find it easily. Afterward
column16:
you can view at which locations the device has tracked you. For this we use background location access. All location data never leaves your device

If no one is trying to track you
column17:
the app will never bother you.

How does it work?



AirGuard uses Bluetooth scans of your Android phone to find AirTags and Find My trackers. Every tracker that is found will be saved locally on your device.
Whenever a tracker gets detected multiple times the app will recognize this. It compares the locations where the tracker has been detected.
If a tracker is detected at least 3 times and the locations have changed (to make sure its not your neighbour) the app sends you a notification.
If this tracker is an AirTag you can play a sound to find it.

All this happens locally on your device and the private information
column18: like location
column19: tracker ids
column20:
etc will never leave your device.

Who are we?


We are part of the Technical University of Darmstadt in Germany. This project is part of a scientific research from the Secure Mobile Networking Lab. Our goal is to protect privacy and to find out how many people are opposed to tracking.
In this app you can voluntarily participate in a research study that will share anonymized data with us.

This app will never get monetized by showing ads
column21:
in-app purchases or anything else.

Our privacy policy can be found here:
https://tpe.seemoo.tu-darmstadt.de/privacy-policy.html

This app is open-source:
https://github.com/seemoo-lab/AirGuard

Disclaimer
AirTag

FindMy and iOS are trademarks of Apple Inc.
We are not working together with Apple Inc.

column22:
the phone's charge is enough for a whole day of recording. There's also an economy mode - you can turn it on in the app settings.


Geo Tracker calculates the following statistics:

altitude difference;

ascent and speed;

column28:
a voluntary donation can be made in the application.


Useful tips & tricks to solve common GPS issues with your smartphone:
â€¢ If you start the tracking please wait with recording your activity until the GPS signal is found.
â€¢ Restart your smartphone and make sure that you have "clear view" of the sky before you start (no disturbing objects like high buildings
column29: forest
column30:
etc.).
â€¢ The reception conditions are permanently changing because they got influenced by the following factors: weather
column35: forest
column37:
choose "Location" and activate it.
â€¢ Go to phone settings
column38:
choose "Date & time" and activate the following options: "Automatic date & time" and "Automatic time zone". It may occur that it takes longer until the GPS signal is found if your smartphone is set to the wrong time zone.
â€¢ Deactivate the airplane mode in your phone settings.


If none of these tips & tricks helped to solve your issues
column39:
deinstall the app and reinstall it again.
Be aware that Google uses in their Google Maps app not only the GPS data but also additional data of the current location from surrounding WLAN networks and/or mobile networks.

title: Remote For Apple TV
summary:
This application is AppleTV remote to control your Apple TV over wifi network.

This app contains two remote in it self.

1st remote for appletv is for older tvOS (tvOS<15) Apple TV 4K 1st Gen
2nd remote for appletv is for new tv OS (tvOS=15) Apple TV 4K 2nd Gen

How To use Apple TV Remote application:-

1. Connect your phone and Apple TV in same wifi network. After that Open the app and select remote type. If you select old remote then pairing with Apple TV is not mandatory but in latest remote pairing with Apple TV is required.

2. After selecting the device press the start button. After that app start discover the Apple TV devices in network and shows the list of the Apple TV devices on the screen of phone.

3. Select Apple TV device from the list. if you use old remote than after selecting the Apple TV device it shows the remote but if you use latest remote then pairing dialog box will start showing on screen.

4. For Pairing enter the pin shows on the screen of the Apple TV. If phone is paires successfully then you can see the remote screen of the app. But if pairing fails dueto any reason like network fluctuations or wrong pin then error message will display on the screen. but if pair fails then reselect appletv and try to pair again.

5. After showing up the remote screen you can use any button to control the Apple TV. Enjoy the app.


You can use this remote as handy use and emergency use.

Our intense of making this app is to help users when they lost remote
scoreText:
